Headline: #44 Wallace-Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/84th
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at O'Hare
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to an animal on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to an animal on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
